name: It Moves
description: It Moves is a horror game that will try to scare you without too many of the typical "screamers", instead relying on atmosphere and suspense. You'll be solving puzzles along the way, and encountering all manner of not-so-friendly creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 300 MB available space
